q: Is IBM allowed to subcontract any of its obligations under the MSA to third parties, and if so, under what conditions?
a: Provider may not delegate or subcontract any of the Services or any of Providers obligations under the Agreement, in whole or in part, without obtaining Customers prior written consent.
